TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract CustomTaskPane implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的自定义任务窗格。

span.span: Represents a custom task pane in a Microsoft Office application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用应用程序级外接程序中的对象可修改自定义任务窗格, 或在自定义任务窗格的位置或可见性发生更改时做出响应。Use a object in an application-level add-in to modify a custom task pane, or to respond when the location or visibility of the custom task pane changes. 任务窗格是用户界面面板, 通常停靠在应用程序窗口的一侧。Task panes are user interface panels that are typically docked to one side of an application window. 有关如何创建自定义任务窗格的信息, 请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes)。For information about how to create custom task panes, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes). 若要控制自定义任务窗格的大小或位置, 可以使用、 和等属性。To control the size or location of the custom task pane, you can use properties such as , , and . 若要在自定义任务窗格移动或更改可见性时做出响应, 可以处理和事件。To respond when the custom task pane moves or changes visibility, you can handle the and events. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法创建自定义任务窗格。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom task pane by using the method. 该示例使用对象的属性设置自定义任务窗格的默认外观, 并为事件定义事件处理程序。The example uses properties of the object to set the default appearance of the custom task pane, and it defines an event handler for the event. 若要编译此示例, 请将代码复制`ThisAddIn`到支持自定义任务窗格的应用程序的外接程序项目中的类中。To compile this example, copy the code into the `ThisAddIn` class in an add-in project for an application that supports custom task panes. 将`ThisAddIn_Startup` 类`ThisAddIn`中的默认方法替换为此`ThisAddIn_Startup`示例中的方法。Replace the default `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in the `ThisAddIn` class with the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in this example. 此示例还假定项目包含一个名`MyUserControl`为的, 并且包含一个名`FlowPanel`为的。This example also assumes that the project contains a named `MyUserControl`, and the contains a named `FlowPanel`. [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#1)]

value.span: 提供自定义任务窗格用户界面的 。

span.span: The that provides the user interface of the custom task pane.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回用于创建自定义任务窗格的。This property returns the that was used to create the custom task pane. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes)。For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性, 在事件的事件处理程序中修改任务窗格的大小。The following code example uses the property to modify the size of the on the task pane in the event handler for the event. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定自定义任务窗格相对于应用程序窗口的位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies where the custom task pane is located relative to the application window.
One of the Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition values.
The default is Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition`枚举的值。The following table lists the values of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition` enumeration. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`msoCTPDockPositionLeft`|将自定义任务窗格停靠在窗口的左侧。Docks the custom task pane to the left side of the window.| |`msoCTPDockPositionTop`|将自定义任务窗格停靠在窗口顶部。Docks the custom task pane to the top of the window.| |`msoCTPDockPositionRight`|将自定义任务窗格停靠在窗口的右侧。Docks the custom task pane to the right side of the window.| |`msoCTPDockPositionBottom`|将自定义任务窗格停靠在窗口的底部。Docks the custom task pane to the bottom of the window.| |`msoCTPDockPositionFloating`|在窗口的前面显示自定义任务窗格。Displays the custom task pane in front of the window. 用户可以将任务窗格拖动到窗口中的任何位置。The user can drag the task pane to any location in the window.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建一个自定义任务窗格, 并为窗格在活动应用程序窗口的前面显示的时间和停靠时间配置不同的默认大小。The following code example creates a custom task pane and configures different default sizes for when the pane displays in front of the active application window, and when it is docked. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当用户更改自定义任务窗格的停靠位置时，或者当代码更改 属性的值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the dock position of the custom task pane, or when code changes the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates an event handler for the event. 此事件处理程序通过在任务窗格上修改的属性来更改任务窗格上的控件的水平或垂直排列。This event handler changes the horizontal or vertical arrangement of controls on the task pane by modifying the property of a on the task pane. 此代码示例假定任务窗格包含一个命名`MyUserControl`的, 并且包含一个名`FlowPanel`为的。This code example assumes that the task pane contains a named `MyUserControl`, and the contains a named `FlowPanel`. 此示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个禁止自定义任务窗格停靠在指定位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that prevents the custom task pane from being docked in the specified position.
One of the Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict values.
The default is Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict`枚举的值。The following table lists the values of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict` enumeration. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNone`|自定义任务窗格的停靠行为没有任何限制。There are no restrictions on the docking behavior of the custom task pane.| |`msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNoChange`|不能更改停靠位置。The dock position cannot be changed. 如果自定义任务窗格是浮动的, 则不能停靠到窗口的一侧。If the custom task pane is floating, it cannot be docked to a side of the window.| |`msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNoHorizontal`|不能将自定义任务窗格停靠在窗口的顶部或底部。The custom task pane cannot be docked to the top or the bottom of the window.| |`msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNoVertical`|自定义任务窗格不能停靠在窗口的左侧或右侧。The custom task pane cannot be docked to the left or right side of the window.|

exception.span: 已调用 的 方法。

span.span: The method of the has already been called.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义任务窗格的高度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the custom task pane, in points.

value.span: 自定义任务窗格的高度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The height of the custom task pane, in points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义任务窗格停靠在文档窗口的左侧或右侧, 则不使用属性。Do not use the property if the custom task pane is docked to the left or the right of the document window. `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight`如果属性为或`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionLeft` ,则属性将返回 0, 并在尝试设置时引发。 If the property is `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight` or `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionLeft`, the property returns 0 and throws a if you try to set it. 最大高度取决于停靠位置。The maximum height depends on the dock position. 当自定义任务窗格停靠在文档窗口的顶部或底部时, 最大高度约为屏幕高度的一半。When the custom task pane is docked to the top or bottom of the document window, the maximum height is approximately half the height of the screen. 自定义任务窗格浮动时, 没有最大高度。When the custom task pane is floating, there is no maximum height. 最小高度取决于多个因素, 并且在 Microsoft Office 的未来版本中可能会更改。The minimum height depends on several factors, and can change in future releases of Microsoft Office. 如果尝试将属性设置为小于最小高度的值, 应用程序会自动将属性重新分配到最小高度。If you try to set the property to a value that is less than the minimum height, the application will automatically reassign the property to the minimum height. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义任务窗格, 该窗格在活动应用程序窗口的前面显示时具有指定的高度。The following code example creates a custom task pane that has a specified height when it displays in front of the active application window. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置自定义任务窗格的标题, 请使用`title` 方法的参数。To set the title of the custom task pane, use the `title` parameter of the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定自定义任务窗格是否可见的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the custom task pane is visible.

value.span: 如果自定义任务窗格可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the custom task pane is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Office 应用程序不提供用户用于显示自定义任务窗格的默认 UI。Microsoft Office applications do not provide a default UI for users to display custom task panes. 如果在外接程序中创建自定义任务窗格, 还应创建一个 UI 元素 (如按钮), 用户可以单击该元素来显示或隐藏自定义任务窗格。If you create a custom task pane in your add-in, you should also create a UI element, such as a button, that users can click to display or hide your custom task pane. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes)。For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义任务窗格并显示它。The following code example creates a custom task pane and displays it. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当用户显示或关闭自定义任务窗格时，或者当代码更改 属性的值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user displays or closes the custom task pane, or when code changes the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Office 应用程序不提供用户用于显示自定义任务窗格的默认 UI。Microsoft Office applications do not provide a default UI for users to display custom task panes. 如果在外接程序中创建自定义任务窗格, 还应创建一个 UI 元素 (如按钮), 用户可以单击该元素来显示或隐藏自定义任务窗格。If you create a custom task pane in your add-in, you should also create a UI element, such as a button, that users can click to display or hide your custom task pane. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes)。For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates an event handler for the event. 每当用户打开或关闭自定义任务窗格时, 此事件处理程序都将更新功能区上切换按钮的状态。This event handler updates the state of a toggle button on the Ribbon whenever the user opens or closes the custom task pane. 此代码示例是演练中[提供的一个更大示例的一部分:将自定义任务窗格与功能区按钮](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-synchronizing-a-custom-task-pane-with-a-ribbon-button)同步。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Synchronizing a Custom Task Pane with a Ribbon Button](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-synchronizing-a-custom-task-pane-with-a-ribbon-button). [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneRibbonSynchronize#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneRibbonSynchronize/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneRibbonSynchronize#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneRibbonSynchronize/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义任务窗格的宽度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the custom task pane, in points.

value.span: 自定义任务窗格的宽度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The width of the custom task pane, in points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义任务窗格停靠在文档窗口的顶部或底部, 则不使用属性。Do not use the property if the custom task pane is docked to the top or the bottom of the document window. `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionTop`如果属性为或`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionBottom` ,则属性将返回 0, 并在尝试设置时引发。 If the property is `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionTop` or `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionBottom`, the property returns 0 and throws a if you try to set it. 最大宽度取决于停靠位置。The maximum width depends on the dock position. 当自定义任务窗格停靠在文档窗口的左侧或右侧时, 最大宽度大约为屏幕宽度的一半。When the custom task pane is docked to the left or right of the document window, the maximum width is approximately half the width of the screen. 自定义任务窗格浮动时, 没有最大宽度。When the custom task pane is floating, there is no maximum width. 最小宽度取决于多个因素, 并且在 Microsoft Office 的未来版本中可能会更改。The minimum width depends on several factors, and can change in future releases of Microsoft Office. 如果尝试将属性设置为小于最小宽度的值, 应用程序会自动将属性重新分配到最小宽度。If you try to set the property to a value that is less than the minimum width, the application will automatically reassign the property to the minimum width. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义任务窗格, 该窗格在活动应用程序窗口的前面显示时, 以及当它停靠到窗口的左侧或右侧时具有不同的默认宽度。The following code example creates a custom task pane that has a different default width when it displays in front of the active application window, and when it is docked to the left or right side of the window. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_TaskPaneReference#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_TaskPaneReference/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取与自定义任务窗格关联的文档窗口。

span.span: Gets the document window that the custom task pane is associated with.

value.span: 一个对象，表示与自定义任务窗格关联的文档窗口。

span.span: An object that represents the document window that the custom task pane is associated with.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要指定与自定义任务窗格关联的文档窗口, 请使用`window` 方法的参数。To specify the document window that the custom task pane is associated with, use the `window` parameter of the method. 属性的类型取决于应用程序。The type of the property depends on the application. 下表列出了`window`参数的有效类型。The following table lists the valid types of the `window` parameter. |应用程序Application|参数类型Parameter type| |-----------------|--------------------| |字Word|`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Window`| |ExcelExcel|`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Window`| |PowerPointPowerPoint|`Microsoft.Office.Interop.PowerPoint.DocumentWindow`| |InfoPathInfoPath|`Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.WindowObject`| |OutlookOutlook|`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Explorer`

- 或 --or-

`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Inspector`| 有关详细信息, 请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes)。For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes).
